title: 18 SGC graded T206  - prices lowered & cards added

posts.post_title: 18 SGC graded T206  - prices lowered & cards added
posts.post_content:
All cards listed are priced including shipping. Feel free to pay by Check/Money Order or Paypal. Feel free to make offers on groups (I am also offering a 10% discount on groups of 5 or more).

Trades would also be entertained for certain Baseball, Football or Hockey Hall of Famers e-mail me if you want to trade.

Front and backs of all the cards can be seen by [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/t206/"]clicking here[/URL]

posts.post_title: Bump for price reduction and also
posts.post_content:
open to trades:
Baseball looking for one of the following: Mickey Mantle, Willie Mays, Jackie Robinson, Joe Sewell,  Elmer Flick, Joe Dimaggio exhibit, Bill Dickey, Joe Sewell, or Ted Williams

Hockey looking for: Henri Richard or most 1930's and earlier Hofers

Matty McIntyre if still available.   Email payment info to: [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url]

Thanks,  Bob
